mdRecord.dcterms:description: Built in 1898, Story Chapel resembles a 15th-century English parish church. The exterior is red-brown sandstone, while the interior features Gothic detailing: stone walls, a carved wooden ceiling, and a wood pulpit and pews. Its architect, Willard T. Sears, also designed Bostonâ€™s famed Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum. -- https://mountauburn.org/private-events/wedding-ceremonies/story-chapel/ [work]
